attention3.ptxt: To know how to use SUZUKI scan tool in detail, refer to its operator’s manual.

s1.ptxt: Turn the ignition switch to OFF position,
Connect SUZUKI scan tool to data link connector (DLC) (1) located under instrument panel at driver’s seat side.
Turn the ignition switch to ON position.
Clear DTC(s) according to the instructions displayed on SUZUKI scan tool.
After completing the clearance, turn the ignition switch to OFF position, and then disconnect SUZUKI scan tool from DLC.
